item.description:
Drop off of all Art work:

You can make your prints and frames any size you want up to 40 inches on the longest side and no smaller than 14 inches on the shortest side.

All accepted photographs need to be submitted for hanging on 5/18/13 and must have a mat signed by the artist (white only), framed and wired (no sawtooth).

 

Please cut out and complete both parts of the form at the bottom of this page. Affix one copy securely to the back of your framed photograph, and submit the other when you drop off your artwork. We are responsible for labeling the artwork on display with artist name, title and price (if your image is being offered for sale). So please provide this info at drop off.

 

PDF of the file can be found in the Files section of this meetup site.

 

Affix securely to back of artwork
Please print clearly

Price: ___________________________

item.name: Worcester Academy of Music - Drop off and Pick up date for Images
